import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { clearItemFromCart, addItem, removeItem } from '../../redux/cart/cartActions' import { CheckoutItemContainer, ImageContainer, TextContainer, QuantityContainer, RemoveButtonContainer } from './CheckoutItemStyle'; const CheckoutItem = ({cartItem, clearItem, addItem, removeItem}) => { const {name, imageUrl, price, quantity} = cartItem return ( {name}
removeItem(cartItem)}>❮
{quantity}
addItem(cartItem)}>❯
 {price} clearItem(cartItem)}>✕ ) } const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ clearItem: item => dispatch(clearItemFromCart(item)), addItem: item => dispatch(addItem(item)), removeItem: item => dispatch(removeItem(item)) }) export default connect(null, mapDispatchToProps)(CheckoutItem)
